faq.answer1: DeWatermark.App is a visual AI platform that leverages AI technology to help automatically remove objects/people from images; retouch, enhance, colorize, correct, cartoonize, and animate photos without using Photoshop or other photo editing tools in a snap.
faq.answer2: Upload your Image => Choose the desired function (After our automated AI program detects) => Choose Object remover & Edit images to your liking => Download & Enjoy it!
faq.answer3: Text remover from image, remove watermark from image? Upload your picture => Choose Erase function => Highlight the watermark, text, logo that you want to delete => Results will be available in just a snap!
faq.answer4: Currently, DeWatermark is completely FREE, allows you to use photos of any resolution/size, allows downloading in HD. It will cost you a lot of money if you use similar products like The inpaint, Cleanup Pictures,...
faq.answer5: DeWatermark supports most web browsers today: Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari,... You can edit photos easily on any browser, on any operation system (Android, iOS)
faq.answer6: We support the most popular image formats available today: JPG, PNG, JPEG,... and allow users to download in HD with JPG.
faq.answer7: Don't be surprised because DeWatermark is the only site that allows you to use UNLIMITED SIZE and ABSOLUTELY FREE image editing - What The Inpaint, Cleanup Pictures, etc. or any other software don't provide.
faq.answer8: DeWatermark is a fully automated AI photo editor that acts only as an intermediary so we do not store any copies of your images (before and after editing). So you can safely and quickly use DeWatermark anonymously.
faq.question2: How to use DeWatermark to remove people from photos, remove objects in photos online?

step1.content: Upload or Drag and drop images into the "Upload Photo" Frame to start editing with DeWatermark.App - the free photo editor.
step1.heading: Upload picture to clean up

step2.content: Select Objects automatically detected by AI to remove object from photo or choose Eraser to blur, beautify, remove acne, restore old photos.
step2.heading: Select feature to edit image

step3.content: DeWatermark’s AI edit images in just a snap, Zoom in, Zoom out, undo or redo manipulate, preview, and apply.
step3.heading: Adjust and preview

step4.content: After editing applications, download the beautiful image you’ve edited or share it directly to your social media.
step4.heading: Download & share

step.subtitle: There are only 4 simple steps to remove object from photo, clean up picture, and create beautiful images like a professional photographer.
